data.benefits: Scheme provides need based facility of Term Loan upto 80% of project cost.
data.eligibility: All existing MSMEs that have a strategic market entry plan for international markets (export oriented).
data.conditions:
For existing unit / fundamentally strong export oriented small and mid-sized companies will be preferred.
Applicant should not be defaults to Bank/FIs.
data.beneficiaries: All existing MSMEs that have a strategic market entry plan for international markets (export oriented).
data.prerequisites:
For existing unit / fundamentally strong export oriented small and mid-sized companies will be preferred.
Applicant should not be defaults to Bank/FIs.
data.nodal_agency: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.context: This scheme is introduced to provide assistance to Export oriented MSMEs under Ubharte Sitaare Programme to promote future export champions with high potential.
data.objective: The main aim is to Export oriented MSMEs for expansion, modernisation, diversification, technology / capacity upgradation, product R&D, etc, by investment in Land and building, machinery and equipment, etc.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides upto 80% of the project cost (joint financing with EXIM Bank also available). 
  2. Upto 25 bps performance/ milestone linked interest incentive.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can directly apply through online portal - https://onlineloanappl.sidbi.in/OnlineApplication/
data.funding_facilitator: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.funding_mechanism: Funds will be disbursed by SIDBI successful sanction and completion of requisite documents.
data.website: Direct Loans  - Small Industries Development Bank of India
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. Bank statement 
3. Financial statements 
4. Bank account details 
5. Other basic KYC documents
data.checklist_info_d:

data.beneficiary: All Industry  - All Entities  - All Locations  - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale  - Up
